</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> [[ArmA:_Mission_Editor#Synchronize_Mode_.28F5.29|Synchronizes]] the trigger with zero or more waypoints. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> trigger '''synchronizeTrigger''' [waypoint1, waypoint2, ...] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> trigger: [[Object]] - trigger to synchronize </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [waypoint1, waypoint2, ...]: [[Array]] of waypoints to synchronize with trigger. Array can be empty to unset. </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> waypoint1: [[Waypoint]] - first waypoint </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> waypoint2: [[Waypoint]] - second waypoint </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_trigger synchronizeTrigger []</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_trigger synchronizeTrigger [_waypoint1]</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>_trigger synchronizeTrigger [_waypoint1, [_group5, 7], _waypoint3]</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[createTrigger]], [[synchronizeWaypoint]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
